title: The "troll" of the game
body:
900+ ping, shows it on chat, 
spikes from 20, isp being shitty,
 0-7, REPORT ASHE SHE'S INTING!
NO SHE'S TILTING
BRO SHE'S TROLLING!

WHAT?! WHAT THE FUDGE! wow guys... really? in what part is tht trolling? the isp's having a pretty shitty morning today and there was no way of knowing b4 tht game...

{{item:3751}} {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}} {{item:3751}} 


R.I.P. Ashe                                     
 {{champion:22}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}} 

idk man,
just a rant going on, 
sry for bothering or wasting your time.
But I had to vent this out somewhere
somewhere where the bear is nowhere
It ain't easy being a troll
Bloody hell man
REPORT ME SOME MORE AND YOU'l HAVE A FACE OF ARROWS!
if only I knew earlier I wouldn't have played rank, good bye Silver, trapped in bronze Q.Q

replies.body: If youre in queensland, realise its a serve storm and dont play.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=Hq9jmx28,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-29T21:59:39.266+0000)
>
> If youre in queensland, realise its a serve storm and dont play.

Mmmmhmmmm

My bad

>If youre in queensland, realise its a serve storm and dont play.

If you're in Queensland, realise its a Cyclone and don't play.
Oh i wasnt being picky lol. I was just agreeing with you. I couldn't give a shit about a silly error like that.

If you've played this game enough you'll know that's how the community acts, it even specifically states on the reporting screen under Intentionally Feeding "not just having a bad game". But you go 0/3 bot and the rest of your teams saying in all chat "REPORT VAYNE FOR INTING" and it just leaves you clueless as to what is going through these idiots heads.
